subject: FW: Bridge to School – Edition 2 [EDM Update]
preview: Hi David and Michelle,I've updated all the articles links to the correct ones and fixed the alignment on the left column. I believe it's all good now.Let us know if you need anything else.

full_threads.body:
Hi David and Michelle,

I've updated all the articles links to the correct ones and fixed the alignment on the left column. I believe it's all good now.

Let us know if you need anything else.

action.text: Joao Henriques assigned to Joao Henriques

full_threads.body:
Hi Joao,
Please find below the current version EDM which is almost ready to go out via MailChimp. Can you please check the link for the ‘Managing School Holidays’ article to ensure that it works. We would like to get this EDM out ASAP, so would appreciate if you can make any of the final amendments in Mail Chimp for it to be distributed.

Regards, David


From: Michelle - Ready to Read <support@bridgetoschool.com.au <mailto:support@bridgetoschool.com.au>>
Sent: Thursday, October 11, 2018 3:49 PM
To: david@readytoread.com.au <mailto:david@readytoread.com.au>
Subject: [Test] Bridge to School – Edition 2

Welcome to Bridge to School
View this email in your browser <https://us15.campaign-archive.com/?e=&u=458ea78fdbaac3f822dd5abbe&id=3afb19c65b>



Bridge to School is an initiative focused on connecting parents and carers with expert information and resources, so their child can start school with confidence.

<https://readytoread.com.au/?p=865&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
Healthy digital habits - with Dr Kristy Goodwin
Today’s pre-schoolers are growing up in a screen-saturated world. Dr Kristy Goodwin provides guidance for developing tech habits to help, rather than hinder, your child’s start to school.

Read more <https://readytoread.com.au/?p=865&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
<https://readytoread.com.au/?p=888&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
The link between hearing, language and literacy
Hearing is essential for language development and literacy. Clinical audiologist Lindsay Reinhardt demystifies childhood hearing.
Read more <https://readytoread.com.au/?p=888&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>

<https://readytoread.com.au/?p=875&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
A safe ride to school
School drop offs and pickups are notoriously crazy times of the day. However, there are simple things you can do to ensure your child remains safe.

Read more <https://readytoread.com.au/?p=875&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>

<https://readytoread.com.au/?p=896&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
Access to literacy for ALL communities
The Ready to Read Community Literacy Program is a not-for-profit initiative designed to broaden access to early literacy.

Read more <https://readytoread.com.au/?p=896&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
<https://readytoread.com.au/?p=884&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
The emotional journey to school
Starting ‘big school’ represents a huge change for children. Psychologist Jane Hewlett provides insight into managing this transition.

Read more <https://readytoread.com.au/?p=884&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>

<https://readytoread.com.au/?p=902&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
Best activity for preschoolers
Ready to Read has been awarded Best Local Preschooler Activity (3-5 years) at the What's On 4 Kids Awards, for making early literacy classes fun and accessible.

Read more <https://readytoread.com.au/?p=902&preview=true&mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>

<https://readytoread.com.au/managing-school-holidays/?mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
Managing school
holidays
School holidays may be the light at the end of the tunnel, but they can become a juggling act for many parents.

Read more <applewebdata://E37D7855-3C2B-4A4A-BDBD-73E48046AFC9>


<https://readytoread.com.au/bridge-to-school/?mc_cid=3afb19c65b&mc_eid=%5bUNIQID%5d>
